subject: Re: Order #SSN1743 confirmed
description_text:
After all the emails trying to confirm the part I was missing you still did
not send the complete rod assembly.
 Still missing the rod end eye bearing I asked you 5 times to confirm you
were sending this?
I also did not receive the updated control box I paid for.
All I received were 3 bags of Bushings, Springs and end caps.


Steve Webb

conversations.body_text: Hi Steve Webb,  Sure, here is the link.       https://www.simsonn.com/products/plus-ultra-upgrade-kit
I placed the order but want to confirm the kit included the hardware arrowed in red (The threaded connecting rod and ball joint)
Kindly confirm the upgrade kit includes the hardware arrowed in red   Thanks

Hi Steve Webb,  I haven’t seen any assembly photos from you yet. Could you please share a picture of your current setup? I’ll help guide you through the assembly and provide an upgrade tutorial video.
Hi Steve Webb,  ​These items are not included by default. Do you need them separately? If so, I can add a note to your order and include them as a complimentary gift.

Yes please, thanks.

On Sun, Jun 15, 2025 at 11:06 PM support@simsonn.com

Thank you for the response
I recived a separate email addressing the missing upper rod and have been
told you will supply one with my upgrade order
The attached images are not ideal in showing the setup but I hope they will
assist you in suggesting how to use the upgrade kit.
(I will be inverting the gas pedal plate)

Thank you for your continued guidance it will be noted on the forums

Steve

On Sun, Jun 15, 2025 at 10:53 PM service@simsonn.com

I have an issue with the purchase of the upgrade kit.
 My original question was if I could purchase the upper connecting rod and
was sent a link to the upgrade kit which I placed an order for
assuming that the rods would be included.
It turns out the missing hardware I needed was not in the kit and that you
have graciously offered to send me free of charge.
Thank you

I still need the upgrade kit but do not need the 3 hydraulic rods.
Can we remove the hydraulic rods on this order for a store credit and
include the newly designed control box?
If there is an additional charge over the credit amount I can pay that


Thanks
Steve Webb
ID 为 451 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单451  
      主题: RE: Order #SSN1743 confirmed  
      描述:  Yes thanks 
 It took all day and a lot of trail and error but I think I have them 75% set 
   
 On a second note I had inquired about a replacement rod and was told to order the upgrade kit which I did but I am concerned it contains the top rod that holds the spring and bushings please see the attached image. 
   
 Can you confirm the upgrade kit contains a replacment upper rod 
   
   
   
  Sent from my T-Mobile 5G Device

Hi Steve Webb,  You purchased a version with one hydraulic rod, we have modified your order to remove the rod and add the control box, you can pay this difference.   https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference-1

Understood
 I have paid the additional charge
So to confirm
1 upgrade kit minus a hydraulic rod
1 Control box
1 complete upper connecting rod with the rod end?

Thank you for your assistance

Steve Webb

Hi Steve Webb,  Yes, don't worry.
Hi Steve Webb,     Please confirm.

Yes but with the end [image: Screenshot 2025-06-17 092812.jpg]

I need the complete rod assembly
Hi Steve Webb,  ok

合并来自工单802  
      主题: Order  
      描述:  Please confirm you have sent the Complete rod assembly including the rod end? 
   
 Thank You  
 Steve Webb 
   
   
   
  Sent from my T-Mobile 5G Device

Hi，Steve Webb，     ​Did you purchase a new PlusX control box? Please provide your order details so I can check it for you.  Also, did you receive the throttle rod shown in the picture? Or have you received it but it's missing the rod end bearing?

Yes I received the rod *I DID NOT* receive the rod end bearing which is
frustrating as I have at least 6 emails confirming I would revive the
complete rod assembly
 Please review all the previous emails *I even sent a photo to confirm the
rod end bearing would be included.*

My original order was for the "Pedal Upgrade Kit" minus the damper in place
of the damper I would receive an updated control box.

 I then paid $19.90 order number SSN177 to pay the difference for the
updated control box
please see the attached image

I expect the upgraded control box and the rod end bearing to be sent ASAP
and by Priority Mail as I have waited nearly a month for
an incomplete order.

Steve Webb

On Sat, Jul 12, 2025 at 3:25 AM service@simsonn.com

What is going on with my order Your CS and comuication leaves a lot to be desired.Sent from my T-Mobile 5G Device
-------- Original message --------

I must apologize for my previous email the bearing was in the bag with the
brake  elastomers  I assumed you had forgotten as it was not on the rod

That said I am still missing the control box I paid for kindly update on
the shipping status

wrote:

> Hi Steve Webb,
>
> ​These items are not included by default. Do you need them separately? If

>

I am also Missing the red and blue springs
Hi Steve Webb,    Thanks for confirming, did you not receive the control box, also the kit you purchased is for the brakes only, so no red or blue springs.

Understood kindly send the control box

Hi Steve Webb,    Ok, we will send you a replacement control box, sorry for the inconvenience.

Please send me tracking info

Tracking please
​  Hello, here is your logistics tracking link. https://www.track718.us/en/detail?nums=JSEGV2375072047YQ

Thank you
